sql_fr_run: with tmp (select max(abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100)) as metric from ((select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_mart_03.txn_dir_redist_sls sa where sa.gl_date between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'txn_dir_redist_sls')  and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'txn_dir_redist_sls') and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='HEMATOLOGY' ) cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'txn_dir_redist_sls') prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name)) select * from tmp
Select case when metric > threshold then 1 else 0 end as res from dq_output_table where entity_id in (301)
